casebody.data:
Kareem ALLEYNE, Petitioner
v.
Police Detective George PIRRONE, Police Detective James Pitts, and Lieutenant Philip Riehl, Respondents No. 156 EAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. September 18, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 18th day of September, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
